name: Dilip NR
summary: Senior Network Security Engineer with 7+ years of experience in network and security engineering, hands-on expertise with Palo Alto, Cisco ASA and Check Point firewalls, load balancers, wireless networking, VMware, and data center management; skilled in threat prevention, routing, switching, troubleshooting, and documentation.

experience.title: Senior Network Security Engineer
experience.description: Led network security engineering with firewalls (Palo Alto, Cisco ASA, Check Point), routers/switches, load balancers (F5 BIG-IP LTM/GTM, Citrix NetScaler), and wireless/network access infrastructure. Implemented security concepts (App-ID, User-ID, Wildfire, GlobalProtect, PKI, SSL decryption), VPNs (Site-to-Site, IPSec), and network segmentation. Managed Cisco IOS/NX-OS devices, VLANs, STP/PVST+/LACP/PAgP, and redundancy. Created network diagrams and documentation using MS Visio and Lucidchart. Monitored and tuned performance with SPLUNK, SolarWinds, SevOne; performed troubleshooting and vendor escalation. Ensured high availability and documented designs.

experience.title: Network Security Engineer
experience.description: Worked on firewall and security engineering initiatives, configured and managed firewall solutions, and supported router/switch configurations. Conducted Layer 2/3 troubleshooting, VLAN management, and VPN implementations. Documented network configurations and maintained network performance.

experience.title: Network Engineer
experience.description: Designed and implemented enterprise networks, configured Cisco routers (7600, 7200) and switches (Nexus 7000, Catalyst 6500/6800), performed IP addressing and WAN configurations. Created network diagrams and documentation; maintained network performance.

experience.title: Junior Network Engineer
experience.description: Assisted in daily network operations, supported routing and switching configurations, and contributed to technical documentation and system support.

education.degree: Bachelor's Degree in Electronics and Communications
